title: It tells me to reconnect even though I didn't join any game!
body: So after a game I waited 2 minutes for the stats to appear but they didn't , so i pressed skip stats . Next time i logged on it told me to reconnect in a game I never joined .  If you can help me please do <3

replies.body: The match may not have been updated to our servers, so it thought you were still in a game.  A relog or waiting a bit can fix this up!  Everything seems fine now, but let me know if you have any issues!
